title: Want to make India a global hub for green hydrogen, says Prime Minister Modi
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced India's goal to become a global hub for green hydrogen production, utilization, and export. The National Green Hydrogen Mission, launched in 2023, aims to drive innovation and attract investment. India has already met its Paris Agreement commitments on green energy ahead of schedule and is focused on new approaches like green hydrogen.
